question: im a 49 year old man who has had diabetes for 15 yaers but had gastric bypass surgery 2 years ago,now i have normal suger levels with no meds. In late march while driving an 18 wheeler i experenced blurry vision and spider web looking vision.i went to my eye doc.that day he said i had a bleed behind the eye and to wait for the blood to drain.after waiting 6weeks i talked him into sending me to a surgeon,who said i needed vitreous surgery.he found 2 spots where there was still some leakage going on.he did some laser work and gave me a shot of steroid in the or.in his office 10 days later i had another round of laser and another steroid shot.it has been 5 days ,should i be seeing better or is it too early yet??? please answer b/c my job as a commercial truck driver is at stake and i am really worried about this.....thank you.
title: slow recovery after eye surgery
